doc.name: codepoint
doc.summary: Designates the integer identifier(s) associated with a Unicode character.

examples.example: get the first codepoint of tString

example.p: repeat for each codepoint tCodepoint of tString

description.overview: Use the codepoint keyword to refer to the integer identifier(s) associated with Unicode character
description.comments:
A codepoint is an integer identifier associted witha a Unicode character. A single character is composed of one or more codepoints.
The hierarchy of the new and altered chunk types is as follows:
byte w of codeunit x of codepoint y of char z of word ...
This chunk type is not of general utility.
